title: Urgent.
body: Hey, so I was playing flex 5s with my friends right? Well, mid fight a gragas flashed atop me and my game starting reconnecting. Good ping right. Doesn't reconnect. I exit to restart game. I am getting Server error, and can't log in. I also cannot access the leagueoflegends home page. It errors for me. Please send help asap. I have approximately 10 mins to get back in their and finish carrying before enemy catches up.

replies.body: honestly ive been using the new beta client for the past few weeks and.. the past few days even when my ping and ALL parts of my net are normal..  i get a consistent 150+ ping thats over 6 times my normal ping... there is a problem with the client or the servers atm which cause me and apparently quite a few others to have bad connections.

Damn, that sounds really rough and I'm sorry it happened to you.  :/  I wasn't able to see any issues with the servers in this case, but there's a possibility your network may have crapped out especially if you couldn't login to the site either.   I suggest going over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) go troubleshoot and resolve whatever is causing this block or disconnect.  It sucks to say we aren't able to alter game stats, but I hope those steps help!
Yeah hey, so I actually managed to install the legacy client just as they ended, and now i have -17 lp. Please give that back. I was 4/1/4 by 12. It was also a problem with your new client.
